properties.title: Web Service Overview- The Interface view

section.name: Interface View Tab: Main View
section.p: The interface view contains useful information and metrics about your project, such as where files are stored, WSDL Style Binding and more. This is intended as a very quick way of getting information and overview of the Interface.

Please note that the Use of the Operations is listed per operation and not with the style. We usually refer to them together (Document/Literal), but since it can change per operation, that where it has to be shown.
